prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, and Bass, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, and Bass, with no Piano.

Style 3:
No Piano is included in this song, which does include Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, and Bass.
